This vignette illustrates application of `sceptre` to a small example dataset. First, install the up-to-date version of `sceptre` from Github, if you have not yet done so.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("katsevich-lab/sceptre")
```



```{r}
library(sceptre)
```
